title: 'GMA' Deals & Steals on smart kitchen savers
text:
'GMA' Deals & Steals on smart kitchen savers originally appeared on goodmorningamerica.com

Tory Johnson is back with exclusive "Deals and Steals" on smart products for your kitchen.

Score big savings on everything from a splatter protector to a knife sharpener, innovative kitchen appliances and more.

The deals start at just $5, and everything is 50% off!

PHOTO: Deals & Steals on smart kitchen savers (ABC News Photo Illustration, Russell Hobbs, Happy Wax, Click and Grow) More

Find all of Tory's "Deals and Steals" on her special deals website, GMADeals.com.

Deal Details:

1. Use the links provided below on the date(s) listed to receive the savings.

2. All deals are available only while supplies last. No back orders, unless specified by the individual vendor. No rain checks.

3. Deals cannot be combined with other coupons and offers.

4. Contact retailers for any questions about products before ordering online.

5. Shipping rates indicated are valid in the continental United States only.

NEED HELP? CONTACT TORY: For those who need assistance with a deal, please email Tory Johnson directly at help@gmadeals.com. Tory and her team respond to all viewer emails within an hour during business hours.

By visiting these website addresses, you will leave Goodmorningamerica.com and be directed to Shopify-powered web stores. Any information you share with the retailer will be governed by its website's terms and conditions and privacy policies. ABC will receive a small share of revenue from purchases through these links.



Score even more savings on today's 'GMA' Daily Deal:

NEED HELP? CONTACT TORY: Anyone who needs assistance with a deal can email Tory Johnson directly: help@gmadeals.com. Tory and her team respond to all viewer emails within an hour during business hours.
description: Tory Johnson is back with exclusive "Deals and Steals" on smart products for your kitchen.  Score big savings on everything from a splatter protector to a knife sharpener, innovative kitchen appliances and more.  Find all of Tory's "Deals and Steals" on her special deals website
